property.name: name
property.formula: (SELECT DISTINCT sta.name FROM AQD.dbo.Inlet i inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on i.Id=o.inletId inner join AQD.dbo.SamplingPoint sp on sp.Id=o.samplingPointId inner join AQD.dbo.Station sta on sta.Id=sp.stationId WHERE i.id = id)

property.name: longitude
property.formula: (SELECT DISTINCT sta.longitude FROM AQD.dbo.Inlet i inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on i.Id=o.inletId inner join AQD.dbo.SamplingPoint sp on sp.Id=o.samplingPointId inner join AQD.dbo.Station sta on sta.Id=sp.stationId WHERE i.id = id)

property.name: latitude
property.formula: (SELECT DISTINCT sta.latitude FROM AQD.dbo.Inlet i inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on i.Id=o.inletId inner join AQD.dbo.SamplingPoint sp on sp.Id=o.samplingPointId inner join AQD.dbo.Station sta on sta.Id=sp.stationId WHERE i.id = id)

property.name: altitude
property.formula: (SELECT DISTINCT sta.altitude FROM AQD.dbo.Inlet i inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on i.Id=o.inletId inner join AQD.dbo.SamplingPoint sp on sp.Id=o.samplingPointId inner join AQD.dbo.Station sta on sta.Id=sp.stationId WHERE i.id = id)

hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT DISTINCT i.inspireId as features FROM AQD.dbo.Inlet i inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on o.inletId=i.Id inner join AQD.dbo.SPProcess pro on o.processId=pro.Id WHERE pro.inspireId = :offering

SELECT DISTINCT i.inspireId as features FROM AQD.dbo.Inlet i inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on o.inletId=i.Id inner join AQD.dbo.SPProcess pro on o.processId=pro.Id inner join AQD.dbo.Pollutant poll on o.pollutantId=poll.Id WHERE pro.inspireId= :procedure AND poll.URI = :observableProperty AND pro.inspireId = :offering

SELECT DISTINCT i.inspireId as features FROM AQD.dbo.Inlet i inner join AQD.dbo.Observation o on o.inletId=i.Id inner join AQD.dbo.SPProcess pro on o.processId=pro.Id WHERE pro.inspireId in (:procedures)
